panels.description: Number of databases per service. Includes system databases.
panels.title: Number of records
Internet Service Fiber Optic Fibre Drift

panels.description: Number of queries to be interpreted and potentially executed. Does not include asynchronous inserts. Does not include queries that failed to parse or were rejected due to AST size limits, quota limits or limits on the number of simultaneously running queries. May include internal queries initiated by ClickHouse itself. Does not count subqueries.
panels.title: Total Queries

panels.description: Number of times when memory limit exceeded for query.
panels.title: Queries with MEMORY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

panels.description: Same as Queries, but only for SELECT queries.
panels.title: SELECT Queries

panels.description: Same as Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for synchronous inserts.
panels.title: Synchronous INSERT Queries

panels.description: Same as Failed Queries, but only for SELECT queries.
panels.title: Failed SELECT Queries

panels.description: Same as Failed Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for Synchronous inserts.
panels.title: Failed Synchronous INSERT Queries

panels.description: Average INSERT query latency. Accounts only for synchronous inserts.
panels.title: Synchronous INSERT query latency (average)

panels.description: Same as Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for asynchronous inserts.
panels.title: Asynchronous INSERT Queries

panels.description: Same as Failed Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for asynchronous inserts.
panels.title: Failed Asynchronous INSERT Queries

panels.description: Number of asynchronous inserts waiting to be flushed.
panels.title: Pending Asynchronous INSERT queries
Local instance page cache hit rate
